context.p: Sometimes screenshots are too large and need to be resized. You can make screenshots smaller using Snagit Editor's resize tool. It will resample the image when resizing to keep the maximum amount of detail. Resizing to make an image larger should be avoided, since it will become blurry.

step.cmd: Enter your desired width in the Width field.
step.stepresult: Snagit Editor will automatically scale the height of the image to match the new width, and vice versa.

taskbody.result: You now have a resized image.
